form.label: Edit Sensor
form.description: In this dashboard, you are able to add in additional sensor information, such as the owner and owners email.

search.query: sourcetype=sensor | stats count by host | fields - count

|stats count | eval "Sensor Name"="$sensor$" | eval owner="$owner$" | eval owner_email="$owner_email$" | eval comment="$comment$" | fields - count | inputlookup sensors.csv append=true | stats last(ASN) AS "ASN" last("ASN Country") AS "ASN Country" last("Last Active") AS "Last Active" last("Network Name") AS "Network Name" last("Network Range") AS "Network Range" last("Sensor IP Address") AS "Sensor IP Address" last("owner") AS "Owner" last("owner_email") AS "Owner Email" last(comment) AS "Comment" by "Sensor Name" | outputlookup sensors.csv
